DOC.brief_summary: This phase III European multicenter , open label , prospective study assess diagnostic accuracy use SonoVue contrast agent guide prostate biopsy comparison current practice ultrasound guide systematic biopsy . The trial involve 15-20 European Centers .
DOC.criteria: Male patient , age ≥ 40 year old Optimization part : Diagnosis prostate cancer Main part : Suspected prostate cancer schedule first biopsy tPSA ≤ 10 ng/mL OR already submit one systematic bioptic procedure negative result currently follow procedure due persistent indication . Written Informed Consent willing comply protocol requirement Documented acute prostatitis urinary tract infection Known allergy sulphur hexafluoride micro bubble Any clinically unstable cardiac condition within 7 day prior SonoVue® administration : evolve ongoing myocardial infarction typical angina rest within previous 7 day significant worsening cardiac symptom within previous 7 day recent coronary artery intervention factor suggest clinical instability ( e.g. , recent deterioration ECG , laboratory clinical finding ) acute cardiac failure , class III/IV cardiac failure severe cardiac rhythm disorder righttoleft shunt Severe pulmonary hypertension uncontrolled systemic hypertension respiratory distress syndrome Bioptic procedure within 30 day admission study ( exclusion criterion main part study ) Determined Investigator patient clinically unsuitable study Participation concurrent clinical trial another trial within past 30 day Repeated participation trial ( patient enrol twice present study )
